briefTitle: Effects Of GW572016 In Combination With Docetaxel (TAXOTERE)
officialTitle: A Phase I, Open-Label Study of the Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of GW572016 in Combination With Docetaxel (Taxotere)
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of subjects with adverse events (AEs) or serious AEs (SAEs)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Advanced solid tumors.
* Able to swallow oral medication.
